metadata.name: Alone
metadata.description:
Alone
What makes this life meaningful to us? Love, hope, pain, happiness, longing and memories..
What matters is how we evaluate this life. Our family, our friends and our entire community. Perhaps the biggest mistake we all make is to be stuck in the past. We have to look forward and enjoy the moment. Life is too short..
We were born alone and will die alone.


The photograph won the second prize in the "Alone" National "Ancient Values" photography contest, one of the important works in my life.



Artist: K.Deniz Kalayci
Camera: Nikon D90
Dimensions: 4288× 2848
Resolution: 300 dpi
Location: Malatya / Turkey
Date:22/08/2013
Edition: 1/1
